vision.title: Pioneering Vietnamese technology, shaping the digital future.
vision.desc: With this vision, the company is committed to:
vision.point1: Developing cutting-edge technology to solve real-world problems.
vision.point2: Becoming a leading technology partner, driving digital transformation.
vision.point3: Elevating Vietnam's position on the global technology map.

mission.title: Providing high-quality software services and products that meet international standards from Vietnam to global customers.
mission.desc: Provide an environment for Vietnamese knowledge and intellect to develop, along with entrepreneurship. Promote a culture of innovation and creativity to drive continuous improvement

slogan: Leading Technology, Shaping the Digital Future.
headingAbout: RikSoft Co is the partner of choice for many of the world’s leading enterprises, SMEs, and technology challengers.
subHeadingAbout: We have extensive expertise across various industries and technological domains, enabling us to provide customized solutions that meet the unique needs of each client. At RikSoft, we are committed to driving innovation and creativity in every project, ensuring our clients achieve their business goals with optimal efficiency and performance at the most competitive cost.
